title: Alison Brie Addresses James Franco Allegations at SAG Awards

meta_data.description: At the SAG Awards, 'GLOW' actress Alison Brie responded to the sexual misconduct allegations against her brother-in-law, James Franco.
meta_data.keywords: sag awards 2018, screen actors guild awards, alison brie, james franco, james franco allegations, alison brie james franco, sag awards, dave franco

og.title: Alison Brie Responds to the Allegations Against James Franco at the SAG Awards
og.description: Franco recently took to late-night television to respond himself.
